Sorting algorithms visualization in Three.js

A small 3D visualization of some sorting algorithms, implemented in Three.js. Nothing fancy, just a test to get the "feel" of the engine.

Press left mouse button and drag the cursor in order to rotate the scene.

Source on Github.
